column5: my minn kota power drive 55lb is stuck at the same speed.. although i have the co pilot.. appears to be the same speed still...  any help on this?
the same happened to me last week i took my pedal apard and cleaned an sprayed it with electrical contact cleaner and regreases everything , it solved the problem.
but i have the co pilot.. even when i used the co pilot only.. no diff??
sounds like a potentiometer problem to me.  Gerritt.
simple xpla   it's the knob on your stove to change the different temps  ok it's behind the knob
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Potentiometer  basically controls voltage... think of a light dimmer switch...  Gerritt.
anyway to fix that? even when i use the copilot it doesn't work.. i assume that part is in the motor then and not in the pedal?

side note: i just bought this from a fellow OFC er.. he said it was working this past weekend.. and for those that didn't notice, i just put in the receptacle just now, but found out the fude holder wire is only 12 guage and gets pretty.warm/hot so i will have to change that, so i just connected the motor directly to the battery to see it running at the moment..
